title: IJAMBO RY’IBANZE
content:
Buri mwaka, ku isi abana bagera kuri miliyoni 9 bari munsi y’imyaka itanu bapfa bazira 
indwara nyamara zishobora kwirindwa. Igiteye impungenge kurushaho nuko benshi 
muribo bapfa batarageza ku mwaka umwe w’amavuko. Undi mubare munini w’abarwara 
izo ndwara basigarana ingaruka z’igihe kirekire.

Mu Rwanda, umusonga, impiswi, malariya na SIDA ubwabyo biri ku isonga mubihitana 
abana bari munsi y’imyaka itanu; hakwiyongeraho imirire mibi, ubuzima bw’umwana 
bukarushaho kuzahara. Ibifashijwe mo n’abafatanyabikorwa bayo, harimo Umuryango 
w’Abibumbye Leta y’u Rwanda yashyizeho ingamba zihamye zo guhangana n’ibi byorezo 
n’indwara byavuzwe haruguru. Ibi bigakorwa hitabwa ku kwirinda indwara, kwivuza hakiri 
kare no kuboneza imirire kandi buri wese abigizemo uruhare. 

Igitabo MENYA URENGERE UBUZIMA kigamije guha buri muturarwanda ubumenyi 
bw’ingenzi mu kurinda impfu z’ababyeyi n’abana. Izo mpfu ahanini zikomoka ku ndwara, 
ibyorezo, impanuka, imirire mibi, ihohoterwa n’ibindi. Ubutumwa burimo buroroshye, 
burumvikana kandi abantu bose bashobora kubukoresha.

Mu bihugu byinshi byakoresheje inyigisho zikubiye muri iki gitabo, byerekana ko ingo
n’imiryango byafashe iya mbere mu gushyira mu bikorwa ubutumwa bukubiyemo.
Imbaraga zakoreshejwe zafashije ku buryo bugaragara mu guteza imbere inzego
z’ubuzima, uburezi no gukumira impfu zihitana ababyeyi n’abana. Ibi birerekana ko natwe
mu Rwanda dushobora kugera kuri byinshi, ingo n’imiryango bihawe ubumenyi kandi
bigashyira mu bikorwa inyigisho zikubiye muri iki gitabo.

Ni muri urwo rwego dusaba abakora mu nzego z’ubuzima, ibitangazamakuru, abayobozi
mu nzego zitandukanye, imiryango itegamiye kuri Leta, iy’abikorera, abarezi, abanyamadini,
inzego z’abagore, iz’urubyiruko n’iz’abate ubumuga, n’umuryango nyarwanda muri
rusange gukoresha MENYA URENGERE UBUZIMA mu kurinda no guteza imbere ubuzima
bw’umubyeyi n’umwana.

Umuryango w’Abibumbye mu Rwanda, mu mikorere yawo yo gutahiriza umugozi umwe,
wiyemeje gukomeza gufasha Leta y’u Rwanda kugira ngo igere neza ku musaruro, intego
n’intumbero yiyemeje.
